subject: Basketball
Assaults
Nightclubs and Cabarets
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh point guard Levance Fields was arrested early yesterday outside a nightclub after the authorities said he tried to grab an off-duty police officer’s weapon and was subdued with a stun gun. Fields was arraigned yesterday afternoon on charges of aggravated assault, disarming a law enforcement officer, disorderly conduct and public drunkenness and released pending a Sept. 24 hearing.
